Story.Title: Workstation's key performance indicators
Story.Description:
In the WebGemba, are shown the most valuable key performance indicators of each workstation, suc as:
  • Produced quantity
  • Delays
  • Lead time

Story.Title: Manual recording of work intervals
Story.Description:
From today it is possible to manually register / modify the work intervals registered by the operators.
       To access the new interface, go to Admin --> User Management
       Then click on the clock icon next to the desired user.

Story.Title: Destination URL after login
Story.Description:
Implemented the function to set an automatic login URL after login.
To set up your personalized login page, log in to your personal area (MyArea) and set your destination URL.

Story.Title: Scrollable Andon
Story.Description:
It is now possible to set the Continuous Scroll of the Andon, in order to display all the orders in progress and even those not yet started.        Furthermore, the scroll speed can be set.
       For the Andon Reparto, you can access the configuration of the department (Plant -> Departments) and access the "Scrolling" section.
       To configure the Complete Andon, you can access from the Admin -> Complete Andon Management menu

Story.Title: Order External ID
Story.Description: With the external order code you can maintain the link between the data of your ERP and Virtual Chief

Story.Title: Quality Module
Story.Description:
It now available as an option the Quality Management Module, with the following functions:
  • Non compliances' management - Watch the video
  • Non compliances' analysis and Risk Management - Watch the video
  • Improvement actions' management with 8D form, assignment of corrective actions to Team Members and Real time progress monitoring

Story.Title: Automatic check-in and check-out from workstations
Story.Description:
Often using the BARCODE GEMBA interface, the task of CHECK-IN and CHECK-OUT at a workstation can represent a significant burden on the activities.
Now you can configure Workstations to AUTOMATICALLY make check-in and check-out when using Gemba barcode

Story.Title: BugFix: user language selection
Story.Description: In the initial configuration you can now select the user's language.

Story.Title: Notice of expiration of the license of use
Story.Description:
Now Kaizen Indicator System informs you 1 month in advance when your license expires.
Remember that in case of non-renewal, the service will be automatically stopped after 15 days from the expiry date.

Story.Title: KIS Multilanguage
Story.Description:
Now Kaizen Indicator System speaks three languages:
  • English
  • Spanish
  • Italian
System can be used by people of different countries because every user can choose the language that he prefers to use Kaizen Indicato System.
